title: Roveer's Storehouse
content:
Roveer's Storehouse Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Lower City Reward 347 Gold

Roveer's Storehouse

Roveer's Storehouse is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Roveer's Storehouse can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Roveer's Storehouse Objectives

Kill the rats. Speak to Chef Roveer.

Roveer's Storehouse Walkthrough

Agree to help Roveer to clear
